data.title: Kulvinder Ghir
data.text:
KULVINDER GHIR is a British actor whose career has spanned over 30 years including a wide range of credits on stage, screen and radio. Kulvinder will next be seen starring in the upcoming BBC series “Black Narcissus”. His most recent credits include the Sky series “Delicious” and Gurinder Chadha’s latest feature “Blinded By The Light” and this is his third collaboration with the writer and director - prior to this he was seen in the ITV series “Beecham House” and this all follows on from his role in the BAFTA nominated film “Bend It Like Beckham”. He is a series regular on the hit BBC show “Still Open All Hours” where is stars as Cyril. Recent theatre work includes “East is East” at the Octagon Theatre, “A Midsummer Nights Dream” directed by Sir Trevor Nunn at the New Wosley Theatre and “Much Ado About Nothing” at the RSC.

Kulvinder is also well-known as one part of the quartet behind the hugely successful BBC comedy “Goodness Gracious Me.” Other notable credits include “Ritu, Sue & Bob Too” and “Jadoo”.

He has also voiced a number of projects, including “The Queen’s Corgi” and “Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service” as Ajay Bains.
